name: Frenzy Production Manager
description:
Build and manage you production line!
Here, you can produce everything if you want. Become a Industry Giant and billionaire.

In this game, you should produce some little things of ordinary life, like lamp bulb, flashlight. But first of all, you should know how to produce, what materials do we need, what processes are needed. Of course, you will learn in the game, that's the first step to be a tycoon.

And then, you should upgrade machines to work on fragiles likeTV, fresh goods like milk, precision instruments like aircraft, etc. and satisfy citizen's demands , large customers’ orders. You have to complete these orders with quality and quantity, otherwise you will lose your credit.

Steadily expand your business. Purchase more vans and machines to improve transport capacity and production efficiency. Meanwhile, you should recruit and train employees. Among them, the elite employees are the most capable people. Everyone has different abilities. Control them tooptimizing all your workshops and departments!

Develop your investment strategy and focus on technology, reducing costs and increasing revenue.

Features:
- Perfect simulation of factory production line.
- Control electric power, financial resources, transport capacity, new technology research and more than 10 departments.
- As a boss, you need to recruit employees, recruit the elites, train them to grow, and protect their welfare!
- Idle and strateg gameplay for every player.
- Constant challenges of employees and incremental workshop and profit.
- Dozens of types of strategies to be controlled.
- Different types of production lines and machines in every factory.
- Numerous PRODUCTIONs and gameplay to be unlocked.
- Management of a small world in miniature.
